import { Link, useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import useFetch from "./useFetch"; const CountryDetails = () => { const {name}=useParams(); const {data, error, isLoding}=useFetch(`https://restcountries.com/v2/name/${name}`); for(let x in data[0]){ console.log(x) } return (
{isLoding &&
Data is loading
} {error &&
{error}
} {data &&
{data[0].name}
Native Name: {data[0].nativeName} Top Level Domaine: {data[0].topLevelDomain} Population: {data[0].population} Currencies: {data[0].currencies[0].name} Native Name: {data[0].nativeName} Native Name: {data[0].nativeName} Native Name: {data[0].nativeName} Native Name: {data[0].nativeName}
}
); } export default CountryDetails;
